key.name: fullname
key.scalar: The full name of the friend.

key.name: journaltype
key.scalar: The type of journal the friend item is.

key.name: fgcolor
key.scalar: The foreground color of the friend item.

key.name: bgcolor
key.scalar: The background color of the friend item.

key.name: groupmask
key.scalar: If the group mask is not "1" (just bit 0 set), then this variable is returned with an 32-bit unsigned integer with a bit 0 always set, and bits 1-30 set for each group this friend is a part of. Bit 31 is reserved.
